knimeNode.name: Spacy Vectorizer
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node converts String or Document data to the vectors (list of doubles) according to the embedder provided by the selected Spacy model.

fullDescription.intro: The node converts String or Document data to the vectors (list of doubles) according to the embedder provided by the selected Spacy model.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select a String or Document column that will be converted to vector.
If checked, the selected column will be replaced by the vector column. Otherwise the vector will be appended as a new column.
The name of the new appended column, containing the vector.

tab.name: Model
tab.option: Pick one of the official spaCy models, or refer to a custom model stored in the filesystem. In the latter case refer to a folder with meta.json and config files.

tab.name: Python
tab.option:
Select one of Python execution environment options:
use default Python environment for Deep Learning
